params.loanID: The ID of the loan to check

canLiquidateLoan(uint256).return: bool weather the loan can be liquidated

params.collateralAmount: Amount of collateral for the loan
params.request: Struct of the protocol loan request
params.responses: List of structs of the protocol loan responses

params.amount: Amount to be deposited as collateral
params.loanID: ID of loan from which collateral was withdrawn
of the loan to get info for

getCollateralInfo(uint256).return: memory TellerCommon.LoanCollateralInfo Collateral information of the loan

params.loanID: The ID of the loan to be queried

getTotalOwed(uint256).return: uint256 The total amount owed remaining

params.collateralTokenAddress: Contract address for the collateral token
params.lendingPoolAddress: Contract address of the lending pool
params.loanTermsConsensusAddress: Contract adddress for loan term consensus
params.priceOracleAddress: Contract address of the price oracle
params.settingsAddress: Contract address for the configuration of the platform

initialized().return: true if contract is initialized. Otherwise it returns false.

params.loanID: The ID of the loan to be liquidated

params.amount: The amount of tokens to pay back to the loan
params.loanID: The ID of the loan the payment is for

setPriceOracle(address).details: It throws a require error if sender is not allowed.It throws a require error if new address is empty (0x0) or not a contract.

settings().details: This address should NOT change over the time. See details in the _setSettings(...) function.

takeOutLoan(uint256,uint256).details: collateral ratio is a percentage of the loan amount that's required in collateralthe percentage will be *(10**2). I.e. collateralRatio of 5244 means 52.44% collateralis required in the loan. Interest rate is also a percentage with 2 decimal points.

params.amount: The amount of collateral token or ether the caller is hoping to withdraw.
params.loanID: The ID of the loan the collateral is for

cToken().notice: Returns the cToken in the lending pool

canLiquidateLoan(uint256).notice: A loan can be liquidated if it is: under collateralized or expired

createLoanWithTerms((address,address,add.notice: Create a loan with specified terms, if allowed

depositCollateral(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Deposit collateral for a loan, unless it isn't allowed

getBorrowerLoans(address).notice: Get a list of all loans for a borrower

getCollateralInfo(uint256).notice: Get collateral information of a specific loan

getTotalOwed(uint256).notice: Returns the total owed amount remaining for a specified loan

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initializes the current contract instance setting the required parameters, if allowed

initialized().notice: Gets if the contract is initialized.

lendingToken().notice: Returns the lending token in the lending pool

liquidateLoan(uint256).notice: Liquidate a loan if it is expired or under collateralized

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: Make a payment to a loan

setPriceOracle(address).notice: Updates the current price oracle instance.

settings().notice: The gets the settings contract address from the SETTINGS_SLOT.

tToken().notice: Returns the tToken in the lending pool

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw collateral from a loan, unless this isn't allowed

userdoc.notice: This contract is used as a basis for the creation of the different types of loans across the platformIt implements the Base contract from Teller and the LoansInterface
